Open from 5am to 11pm daily, the park accommodates early risers and evening visitors alike. Based on the reviews, dog owners can expect a reliable spot for spending time with their pup.

name: Randall Park
description: At 1399 S 48th Ave in Yakima, Randall Park stands out with 4.5 stars from 1,062 happy dog owners. Open from 6am to 10pm daily, the park accommodates a variety of dog owner schedules and routines. Want to give your pup even more adventure? Sherman Park is another beloved dog park just 4.8 miles away.

name: ‍ Norman & Nellie Dog Park
description: Norman & Nellie Dog Park in Yakima has 4.4 stars from 24 dog owner reviews. For dog owners in the neighborhood, this park offers a place to take their pups. Dog owners might also enjoy Sherman Park, another dog park just 0.2 miles away.

name: ‍ Sherman Park
description: Dog owners in Yakima have rated Sherman Park (1401 Arboretum Dr) 4.3 stars across 58 reviews. For dog owners in the neighborhood, this park offers a place to take their pups. Looking to explore more? Norman & Nellie Dog Park is another dog-friendly park 0.2 miles from here.
